评论详情: Pros: These jeans look nice and match the photo in the advertisement, however... Cons: These pants are the heaviest and roughest material that I have ever worn.

One pocket was a lil undone but u can see the end a lil on my end but also size Is way off. For a ref. Im normally a size 5-6 us and had to order an extra large for the waste to fit. So order big. Other than that they do have that cute 90s grunge look which is all me lol
These pants are very comfortable. Can be worn versatile with any top or shoes. The material is made to last. Would recommend.

评论概述: Super baggy legs, sized to fit waist
评论详情: We initially got these for our 13 year old but their waist was still too narrow. The length was almost right. We may hold off on these till high school. The style is very baggy. Pockets galore! And the bottom strap is...interesting. We got the medium and the waist is just about a 30.
